post.body: is this some kind of new year's resolution you got going?
keep us updated. I'm intrigued as to wether it's actually just a shiney, repackaged and slightly different service package for vista.
@zcott FAIL. I just read all the internets and all of wikipedia twice. Beat that.
If you see me on reddit, facebook or twitter within the next two hours i officially give you permission to punch me in the face.
lulz... a whole load of famous twitter accounts got hacked. Must be that phishing problem they had earlier on in the week.
Meh. Why bother sleeping...
Complaining about lack of iTunes on Ubuntu. It's a shame the Iphone is such a closed platform. I didn't want to jailbreak it. Fuck you Apple
Watching P.S I Love You... Don't know why.
Watching Paris Je T'aime. Good so far. Natalie Portman's in it, probably the only thing that inspired me to watch it.
Excited about www.mint.com coming to both UK and IPhone!
Sufjan Steven's illnoise is such christmas music. Even though it's not Christmas anymore.
Listening to Lady GaGa and Shiny toy guns via Amarok. Seriously my favorite media player out there.
Using Ubuntu from now on due to shitty vaio problems. TOO many options to choose from..
I just destroyed my computer via sony's stupid restore tools. Ahhhhhh!! http://twitpic.com/yubk
I need some interesting people to follow on twitter now i have a shiney iphone. Any ideas?
Star Trek NEEDS to happen in real life or I'll be disapointed in the universe.
I really can't understand why people give a fuck about new years eve.
Mite try doing something productive tomorrow like reinstalling xp. Anyone ever have problems with contacts on iPhone? Mine randomly delete
Watching Lions for lambs. Hmmmm
